name: Yellow Car Game
description:
A multiplayer game based on the famous children's game: Yellow Car (Gul Bil in Swedish). 

Playtime: 5 minutes per round 

This is our first released prototype, got feedback, or do you want more updates? Let us know!
Make sure to Follow Us on Instagram& Youtube!

This prototype features:

  • 20 players per room
  • Online multiplayer
  • 1 prototype map
  • Ragdoll physics
  • Custom nicknames and roomnames
  • Lots of explosions.

Developed by Miracle Bread Productions UF.
Sounds from Zapsplat.com
Idea: Gorgest_Boi#0329 on Discord

Join our Discord!
